amendment.description: An amendment to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used to offer a government loan to a sugar processor at a loan rate in excess of 17 cents per pound for cane sugar and 21.9 cents per pound for sugar beet.

action.text: On agreeing to the Miller (FL) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 258, 1 Present (Roll No. 261).
